content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 units of stone, and my inventory now reflects this change.
# Now that I have enough stone, I will proceed to craft stone bricks from the raw stone.

# The recipe for stone bricks requires 2 stones to create 1 stone brick. 
# Therefore, I can craft 5 stone bricks from the 10 stones I have.

craft_item(Prototype.StoneBrick, quantity=5)  # Attempt to craft 5 stone bricks using the stones in my inventory.
